name: Gloomy Harvester
description:
Gloomy Harvester

Gloomy Harvester was made under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52 (topic: Harvest).

Description

Explore a dark, gloomy world, look for flowers, and get to the flower basket. There is one more thing. You are not alone there. Be careful about the monster that will disturb you from achieving your goal.

Guide

The goal of the game is to harvest 50 flowers and get with them to the flower basket. Don't let the monster destroy your plants.

Keys MoveA, DJumpSpaceInteractE
